sections.heading: writ; answer.On the return day of the alternative writ, or such further day as the court may allow, the party on whom the writ shall have been served may show cause, by answer made, in the same manner as an answer to a complaint in a civil action
sections.text: SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 651, p. 508;R.S.1913, ยง 8277;C
